features: Pay what you think is fair (or enter "0" to get it for free!); Continue with the checkout process and add your email; You'll receive an email containing the link and be redirected to the product page; Before you click on the template link make sure to give this product a rating; Open the Notion link and click duplicate in the top right corner and enjoy!
